quotes.author: Rachel Carson
quotes.quote: In every outthrust headland, in every curving beach, in every grain of sand there is the story of the earth.

quotes.author: Kate Chopin
quotes.quote: The voice of the sea speaks to the soul. The touch of the sea is sensuous, enfolding the body in its soft, close embrace.

quotes.author: Walt Whitman
quotes.quote: To me the sea is a continual miracle; The fishes that swim–the rocks–the motion of the waves–the ships, with men in them, What stranger miracles are there?

quotes.author: Isak Dinesen
quotes.quote: The cure for anything is salt water – sweat, tears, or the sea.

quotes.author: John F. Kennedy
quotes.quote: We are tied to the ocean. And when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch – we are going back from whence we came...

quotes.author: Wyland
quotes.quote: The sea lives in every one of us.

quotes.author: Frank Borman
quotes.quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.

quotes.author: Wernher Von Braun
quotes.quote: Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing.

quotes.author: Isaac Asimov
quotes.quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'

quotes.author: Isaac Newton
quotes.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.

quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.

quotes.author: JRR Tolkien
quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau
quotes.quote: The Sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.

quotes.author: Carl Sagan
quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

quotes.author: David Attenborough
quotes.quote: I just wish the world was twice as big and half of it was still unexplored.
